project.summary: Developed an interactive real-time map application for the mobile game Monster Hunter Now. This web application allows players to upload and share monster sightings, enhancing the gaming experience.
project.description:
Developed an interactive real-time map application for the mobile game **Monster Hunter Now**. This web application allows players to upload and share monster sightings, enhancing the gaming experience.
This project not only enhanced my frontend development skills but also deepened my understanding of building scalable, real-time web applications. It successfully attracted over **5,000** active users.
Key Features:
-Real-time monster location sharing
-Interactive map interface
-**3 languages support**
-Responsive design for mobile and desktop
project.name: Monster Hunter Map
